title: Top Places to visit in Jagtial, Telangana
content:
Jagtial is a City and the district headquarters Jagtial district of Telangana, India. It has an average elevation of 293 metres (961 ft)..It is located about 190 kilometres (118 mi) north of the state capital Hyderabad, 49 kilometres (30 mi) from Karimnagar and 99 kilometres (62 mi) from Nizamabad.

Jagtial is a district located in the northern region of the Indian state of Telangana.It was a part of the Karimnagar district before re-organisation of districts in the state.

 

Demographics

The total population of Jagtial UA/Metropolitan region is 103,930. The male population of which is 51,828 while female population is 52,102.

 

Geography

The district is spread over an area of 2,419.00 square kilometres (933.98 sq mi). Jagtial district shares it boundaries with Nirmal district and Mancherial district on North and North East respectively, it is bounded on South and South West by Karimnagar district and Peddapalli district respectively and on the West by Nizamabad district

 

Demographics

As of 2011 Census of India, the district has a population of 985,417.

 

Administrative divisions

The district has two revenue divisions of Jagtial and Metpally, which are sub-divided into 18 mandals.

 

Mandals

The below table categorizes mandals into their respective revenue divisions in the district:

 

# Jagtial revenue division # Metpalli revenue division

1 Jagtial 1 Korutla

2 Jagtial Rural 2 Metpalli

3 Raikal 3 Mallapur

4 Sarangapur 4 Ibrahimpatnam

5 Beerpur 5 Medipalle

6 Dharmapuri 6 Kathlapur

7Buggaram

8Pegadapalli

9Gollapalli

10Mallial

11Kodimial

12Velgatur

 

Jagtial Assembly constituency is a constituency of Telangana Legislative Assembly, India. It is one among 3 constituencies in Jagtial district. It is part of Nizamabad Lok Sabha constituency

 

M.Sanjay Kumar of Telangana Rashtra Samithi won from the constituency for the time in 2018 Legislative Assembly Election.

 

source: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Jagtial

recommendations.title: Top Places to visit in Rajanna Sircilla, Telangana
recommendations.content:
Rajanna Sircilla district is a district in the Indian state of Telangana. It was a part of the Karimnagar district prior to the re-organisation of districts in the state. Sircilla is the district headquarters. It was formed on 11 Oct 2016.

recommendations.title: Top Places to visit in Nizamabad, Telangana
recommendations.content: Nizamabad is a city in the Indian state of Telangana. Nizamabad is a major urban agglomeration and third largest city in the state. recommendations.title: Top Places to visit in Medchal-Malkajgiri, Shamirpet, Telangana
recommendations.content: Medchal−Malkajgiri is a district in the Indian state of Telangana. Medchal is the headquarter of the district. recommendations.title: Top Places to visit in Adilabad, Telangana
recommendations.content: Adilabad, a municipality, and the headquarters of Adilabad district, is a city in Adilabad district of the Indian state of Telangana.
